# Changelog

## `0.0.5` (2018-04-22)

Fix up types temporarily.

## `0.0.4` (2018-04-21)

Fix broken publish.

## `0.0.3` (2018-04-21)

Implement rudimentary table parsing.

## `0.0.2` (2018-04-20)

Compile for the `node` WebPack `target`.

## `0.0.1` (2018-04-20)

Initial version with rudimentary block parsing and inline link parsing.
